```{r}
build_github_card_layout <- function(repo_name, description) {
  cat(
    '::: {.grid}\n\n',
    '::: {.g-col-6}\n\n',
    description,
    '\n\n:::\n\n',
    '::: {.g-col-6}\n\n',
    '<div class="github-card" data-github="surveydown-dev/', repo_name, '" data-width="400" data-height="153" data-theme="default"></div>\n',
    '<script src="//cdn.jsdelivr.net/github-cards/latest/widget.js"></script>\n',
    '\n\n:::\n\n',
    ':::\n\n',
    sep = ""
  )
}

build_github_card_grid <- function(df) {
  for (i in 1:nrow(df)) {
    cat('\n### ', df$title[i], '\n\n', sep = "")
    build_github_card_layout(
      repo_name = df$repo_name[i],
      description = df$description[i]
    )
    cat('\n')  # Add a newline between entries for better readability
  }
}
```
